${ModID}:LayeredDefenses.NAME: Layered Defenses
${ModID}:LayeredDefenses.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! Block for each card type in your hand.

${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage a获得.

${ModID}:PlasmaShield.NAME: Plasma Shield
${ModID}:PlasmaShield.DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时， 获得 !M! Block if you have Plasma. NL Channel !${ModID}:m2! Plasma.

${ModID}:Enrage.NAME: Enrage
${ModID}:Enrage.DESCRIPTION: Discard !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:Whispers.NAME: Whispers
${ModID}:Whispers.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL Add a *Dazed to your hand.

${ModID}:Replenish.NAME: Replenish
${ModID}:Replenish.DESCRIPTION: Put two cards from your 弃牌堆 into your hand. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Replenish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put two cards from your 弃牌堆 into your hand.

${ModID}:LesserHex.NAME: Lesser Hex
${ModID}:LesserHex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量. NL Add a *Greater Hex to your 弃牌堆. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:LesserHex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量. NL Add a *Greater Hex+ to your 弃牌堆. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:GreaterHex.NAME: Greater Hex
${ModID}:GreaterHex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Conjuration.NAME: Conjuration
${ModID}:Conjuration.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your 抽牌堆. NL Play and Exhaust it.
${ModID}:Conjuration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your 抽牌堆. NL Play it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no cards in my 抽牌堆.

${ModID}:RareStrike.NAME: Rare Strike
${ModID}:RareStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your *Rares.
